tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_progress (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapy_session_id INT,
  intervention_name VARCHAR(255),
  therapist_name VARCHAR(255),
  progress_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE TherapyTechniques (
  technique_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  technique_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  therapist_name VARCHAR(50),
  session_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PatientProgress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    therapy_id INT NOT NULL,
    intervention_id INT NOT NULL,
    progress_date DATE,
    progress_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE therapy_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    therapist_id INT,
    session_date DATETIME,
    session_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Sessions (
  session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  therapist_id UUID,
  therapy_id UUID,
  session_date DATE,
  notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Interventions (
  intervention_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  therapist_id UUID,
  intervention_type VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);
